overview: Hana (Aoi Ito), a high school student, lost her parents in an accident and has been unable to find a place to live at school. One day, she is suddenly visited by a man claiming to be from a special government agency who asks her to tell him about a dream she had. Hana is confused because she has no idea what he is talking about, but that night she has a strange dream.
title: Sekai no Owari kara
